00060 /********************* 3d view operators ***********************/

00062 static int objects_add_active_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00063 {
00064     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00065     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00066     Object *ob= OBACT;
00067     Group *group;
00068     int ok = 0, cycle = 0;
00069     
00070     if (!ob) return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00071     
00072     /* linking to same group requires its own loop so we can avoid
00073      * looking up the active objects groups each time */
00074 
00075     for (group= bmain->group.first; group; group=group->id.next) {
00076         if (object_in_group(ob, group)) {
00077             /* Assign groups to selected objects */
00078             CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Base*, base, selected_editable_bases) {
00079                 if (base->object->dup_group != group)
00080                     add_to_group(group, base->object, scene, base);
00081                 else
00082                     cycle = 1;
00083                 ok = 1;
00084             }
00085             CTX_DATA_END;
00086         }
00087     }
00088     
00089     if (!ok) BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Active Object contains no groups");
00090     if (cycle)
00091         BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_WARNING, "Skipped some groups because of cycle detected");
00092     
00093     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
00094     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GROUP|NA_EDITED, NULL);
00095     
00096     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00097 }
00098 
00099 void GROUP_OT_objects_add_active(wmOperatorType *ot)
00100 {
00101     /* identifiers */
00102     ot->name = "Add Selected To Active Group";
00103     ot->description = "Add the object to an object group that contains the active object";
00104     ot->idname = "GROUP_OT_objects_add_active";
00105     
00106     /* api callbacks */
00107     ot->exec = objects_add_active_exec; 
00108     ot->poll = ED_operator_objectmode;
00109 
00110     /* flags */
00111     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00112 }
00113 
00114 static int objects_remove_active_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00115 {
00116     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00117     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00118     Object *ob= OBACT;
00119     Group *group;
00120     int ok = 0;
00121     
00122     if (!ob) return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00123     
00124     /* linking to same group requires its own loop so we can avoid
00125      * looking up the active objects groups each time */
00126 
00127     for (group= bmain->group.first; group; group=group->id.next) {
00128         if (object_in_group(ob, group)) {
00129             /* Assign groups to selected objects */
00130             CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Base*, base, selected_editable_bases) {
00131                 rem_from_group(group, base->object, scene, base);
00132                 ok = 1;
00133             }
00134             CTX_DATA_END;
00135         }
00136     }
00137     
00138     if (!ok) BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Active Object contains no groups");
00139     
00140     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
00141     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GROUP|NA_EDITED, NULL);
00142     
00143     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00144 }

00146 void GROUP_OT_objects_remove_active(wmOperatorType *ot)
00147 {
00148     /* identifiers */
00149     ot->name = "Remove Selected From Active Group";
00150     ot->description = "Remove the object from an object group that contains the active object";
00151     ot->idname = "GROUP_OT_objects_remove_active";
00152     
00153     /* api callbacks */
00154     ot->exec = objects_remove_active_exec;  
00155     ot->poll = ED_operator_objectmode;
00156     
00157     /* flags */
00158     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00159 }

00161 static int group_objects_remove_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00162 {
00163     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00164     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00165     Group *group= NULL;
00166 
00167     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Base*, base, selected_editable_bases) {
00168         group = NULL;
00169         while ((group = find_group(base->object, group)))
00170             rem_from_group(group, base->object, scene, base);
00171     }
00172     CTX_DATA_END;
00173 
00174     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
00175     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GROUP|NA_EDITED, NULL);
00176     
00177     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00178 }
00179 
00180 void GROUP_OT_objects_remove(wmOperatorType *ot)
00181 {
00182     /* identifiers */
00183     ot->name = "Remove From Groups";
00184     ot->description = "Remove selected objects from all groups";
00185     ot->idname = "GROUP_OT_objects_remove";
00186     
00187     /* api callbacks */
00188     ot->exec = group_objects_remove_exec;   
00189     ot->poll = ED_operator_objectmode;
00190     
00191     /* flags */
00192     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00193 }

00195 static int group_create_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00196 {
00197     Main *bmain= CTX_data_main(C);
00198     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00199     Group *group= NULL;
00200     char name[MAX_ID_NAME-2]; /* id name */
00201     
00202     RNA_string_get(op->ptr, "name", name);
00203     
00204     group= add_group(name);
00205         
00206     CTX_DATA_BEGIN(C, Base*, base, selected_editable_bases) {
00207         add_to_group(group, base->object, scene, base);
00208     }
00209     CTX_DATA_END;
00210 
00211     DAG_scene_sort(bmain, scene);
00212     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_GROUP|NA_EDITED, NULL);
00213     
00214     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00215 }

00217 void GROUP_OT_create(wmOperatorType *ot)
00218 {
00219     /* identifiers */
00220     ot->name = "Create New Group";
00221     ot->description = "Create an object group from selected objects";
00222     ot->idname = "GROUP_OT_create";
00223     
00224     /* api callbacks */
00225     ot->exec = group_create_exec;   
00226     ot->poll = ED_operator_objectmode;
00227     
00228     /* flags */
00229     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00230     
00231     RNA_def_string(ot->srna, "name", "Group", MAX_ID_NAME-2, "Name", "Name of the new group");
00232 }

00236 static int group_add_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00237 {
00238     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00239     Object *ob= ED_object_context(C);
00240     Group *group;
00241 
00242     if (ob == NULL)
00243         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00244 
00245     group= add_group("Group");
00246     add_to_group(group, ob, scene, NULL);
00247 
00248     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, ob);
00249 
00250     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00251 }

00258     ot->description = "Add an object to a new group";

00267 static int group_link_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00268 {
00269     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00270     Object *ob= ED_object_context(C);
00271     Group *group= BLI_findlink(&CTX_data_main(C)->group, RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "group"));
00272 
00273     if (ELEM(NULL, ob, group))
00274         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00275 
00276     add_to_group(group, ob, scene, NULL);
00277 
00278     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, ob);
00279 
00280     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00281 }

00283 void OBJECT_OT_group_link(wmOperatorType *ot)
00284 {
00285     PropertyRNA *prop;
00286 
00287     /* identifiers */
00288     ot->name = "Link to Group";
00289     ot->idname = "OBJECT_OT_group_link";
00290     ot->description = "Add an object to an existing group";
00291     
00292     /* api callbacks */
00293     ot->exec = group_link_exec;
00294     ot->invoke = WM_enum_search_invoke;
00295 
00296     /* flags */
00297     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER|OPTYPE_UNDO;
00298 
00299     /* properties */
00300     prop= RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "group", DummyRNA_NULL_items, 0, "Group", "");
00301     RNA_def_enum_funcs(prop, RNA_group_local_itemf);
00302     ot->prop = prop;
00303 }
00304 
00305 static int group_remove_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00306 {
00307     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00308     Object *ob= ED_object_context(C);
00309     Group *group= CTX_data_pointer_get_type(C, "group", &RNA_Group).data;
00310 
00311     if (!ob || !group)
00312         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00313 
00314     rem_from_group(group, ob, scene, NULL); /* base will be used if found */
00315 
00316     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_OBJECT|ND_DRAW, ob);
00317     
00318     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00319 }
